column4: *tries again a bit more orderly* I just logged out of Ubuntu, and when I tried to log back in it wouldn't load my desktop (only gave me an X as my curser)... this is kinda urgent,,, can anyone help?
Use <ctrl><alt><F1> to get to the text console.  Then you can log in and poke around the log files and ps output.
what command would I use to start GDM?
Since gdm is already running you would use    sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
